allow: Bash(powershell.exe -NoProfile -Command "Get-ChildItem -Path ''node_modules'' -Recurse -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Remove-Item -Recurse -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Start-Sleep -Seconds 2; Write-Host ''Cleanup done''")

Bash(powershell.exe -Command "Start-Sleep -Seconds 3; Remove-Item -Path ''node_modules'' -Recurse -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Remove-Item -Path ''package-lock.json'' -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Start-Sleep -Seconds 2; npm install")
Bash(wmic process where "name=''node.exe'' or name=''Code.exe'' or name=''VSCode.exe''" get ProcessId,Caption)

Bash(powershell.exe -Command "Start-Sleep -Seconds 3; Remove-Item -Path ''node_modules'' -Recurse -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Remove-Item -Path ''package-lock.json'' -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Start-Sleep -Seconds 2; Write-Host ''Cleanup done''")
Bash(cmd.exe /c "timeout /t 5 /nobreak >nul && rd /s /q node_modules && del /f /q package-lock.json && npm install")
